name: Lemon-Ginger Water
author: France C
summary: This lightly sweetened detox water not only quenches your thirst, it's also loaded with ginger's many health benefits. Adjust the honey and ginger to your tastes. I like to sip this throughout the day, especially during cold and flu season. I sometimes like to add turmeric or a couple pinches of cayenne pepper to the mix.
directions: Combine lemon juice, filtered water, ginger, and honey in a blender; blend for 20 to 30 seconds
Strain the mixture evenly into 4 quart-sized mason jars or a 1-gallon pitcher
Top off with remaining water and stir
Place lids on jar or cover pitcher and store in the refrigerator
